title: Egotist Townie

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have the abilities and attributes of a random Town role, and spawn in Town slots.
- Your presence is announced Day 2.
- Beginning Day 2, at the start of each day, the game will be 20% faster (additive), capping out at an extra 100% speed (or twice the normal speed). This effect is removed after your death.
- You do not suffer from attributes from your own role that punish you for negatively affecting the Town.
- **Etheral Defense** - Your defense only applies to evil and Neutral roles. Town roles ignore your defense. Can stack with Basic defense, if obtained.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town lose.
